data.title: LadyLingua Ltd on LinkedIn: We can't agree more...
data.text:
🌍 𝐆𝐨𝐨𝐠𝐥𝐞 𝐖𝐨𝐫𝐤𝐬𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐞’𝐬 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐄𝐯𝐨𝐥𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: 𝐁𝐫𝐢𝐝𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐋𝐚𝐧𝐠𝐮𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐁𝐚𝐫𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐫𝐬 🎙️ Exciting news from #GoogleCloud Next 2024! Google Workspace is enhancing its translation capabilities to connect users across the globe like never before. 🚀 Google Chat will soon feature automatic message translation, fostering seamless communication in diverse languages. Google Meet expands its ‘Translate for me’ feature, adding captions in 52 new languages, totaling 69 supported languages for inclusive meetings. An AI Meetings Add-on priced at $10/user/month includes Gemini in Chat and Meet, offering AI-powered meeting summaries and messaging assistance. Stay tuned for these transformative updates, set to revolutionize the way we collaborate and communicate internationally 🌐 #GoogleWorkspace #CloudNext2024 #TranslationTools #GlobalCommunication Source: https://lnkd.in/dJRXiinE

𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐩: 𝐅𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐋𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐭𝐨 𝐒𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐝 The Perkins Library at the Perkins School for the Blind has taken a step into the auditory cosmos, offering an experience where a solar eclipse is not seen but heard. This innovative translation from light to sound opens up a new dimension of celestial events for those who experience the world through different senses. 🎧 We celebrate this leap in translation technology that enriches our understanding and enjoyment of the astronomical wonders. Source: https://lnkd.in/diUftu6A #SoundOfAstronomy #TranslationInnovation #AccessibleUniverse #EclipseSonification

🌐 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐲 𝐀𝐡𝐞𝐚𝐝 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐂𝐮𝐭𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠-𝐄𝐝𝐠𝐞 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐓𝐞𝐜𝐡 🚀 Exciting news for all language enthusiasts and professionals! Mozilla Firefox is introducing a new translation feature that allows you to translate selected text snippets directly within the browser. 📝✨ This innovative feature, available in Firefox Nightly builds, is a game-changer for quick and efficient translations. Say goodbye to translating entire web pages when you only need a portion. With just a highlight and a click, you can translate text on the fly while preserving your privacy. 🔒 Whether you’re browsing social media, forums, or language learning websites, this tool is designed to make your multilingual experience seamless. 🌍 🔥 Try it now and experience the future of translation technology! #TranslationTech #FirefoxUpdate #LanguageSolutions #Localization #InnovationInTranslation #PrivacyFirst 𝐑𝐞𝐟𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞: omgubuntu.co.uk

🌟 #AI and #Translation: A Game-Changing Duo 🌐 The world of translation is undergoing a seismic shift, thanks to the fusion of AI and NMT. As highlighted in a recent Techopedia interview with Skrivanek’s CSO, Arturs Peha, we’re not just seeing changes; we’re witnessing a revolution in language services. AI is not here to replace the human touch but to enhance it. It’s about combining the precision of machines with the irreplaceable insight of human translators. The result? Faster, more accurate translations that still capture the heart and soul of the original message. As we embrace this new era, let’s navigate the ethical landscape together, ensuring privacy, fairness, and cultural richness remain at the forefront. 🔗 Dive deeper into this fascinating conversation and discover how AI is reshaping our world, one word at a time. Read More: https://lnkd.in/eB-wkaFS #LanguageServices #MachineTranslation #NeuralNetworks #EthicalAI #CulturalNuance #FutureOfWork #TechInnovation

𝐗𝐓𝐌 𝐂𝐥𝐨𝐮𝐝 13.6 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐞𝐬 𝐂𝐥𝐨𝐬𝐞𝐝 𝐁𝐞𝐭𝐚 𝐅𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐎𝐩𝐞𝐧𝐀𝐈 𝐆𝐏𝐓 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 XTM International has announced a closed beta feature that integrates OpenAI GPT into XTM Cloud 13.6, marking a significant advancement in translation technology. This feature emphasizes user privacy and customization, allowing customers to process data through their own OpenAI subscriptions, ensuring full control over their information. Project managers can also enable or disable GPT for each language pair, providing tailored translation workflows. Sara Basile, Product Director, highlighted the company’s commitment to responsible AI use, ensuring users benefit from the latest technology while retaining data ownership. Future updates will include auto fuzzy completion, enhancing translation accuracy and fluency with GPT’s contextual understanding. Additionally, XTM Cloud 13.6 introduces improvements such as streamlined XML file localization, parallel analysis of XLIFF files for Private Cloud customers, enhanced XTM API for more control and reporting options, and an improved Visual Mode for Adobe Experience Manager projects. For more details: https://lnkd.in/euN_SuHV #Translation #AI #LanguageTechnology #FutureOfTranslation #Innovation #DataSecurity #Customization #AIIntegration
